channel.title: NSITPedia
channel.description: The Ultimate place for everything about NSIT!

item.title: Society Experiences – Rotaract Club of NSIT Regency
item.dc:creator: Deepika Naryani
item.description: Name: Chaitali Mitra Society: Rotaract Club of NSIT Regency Q 1. What is a typical day/meet like in your society? Our society meets are always fun filled and yes, includes a good session between the juniors and seniors. All the events end up in dancing and a lots of photos , so primarily we serve […]

item.title: Society Experiences – The Debating Society of NSIT
item.dc:creator: Ayush Garg
item.description: Name: Anvesha Dosajh Society: The Debating Society of NSIT Q 1. What is a typical day/meet like in your society? Meets in the society vary from regular Group discussion sessions, MUN Training sessions, Parliamentary Debate Workshops to literary meets of ‘The Page Turners’. Debsoc is an open society. Students from all years are invited to participate in […]

item.title: Society Experiences – Bullethawk Racing
item.dc:creator: Deepika Naryani
item.description: Name: Shubham Gupta Society: Bullethawk Racing Q 1. What is a typical day/meet like in your society? Well, the members of the concerned department would meet up at a decided time, make some calls to the non punctual ones, discuss the work to be done, get into the garage and start working while some go out […]

item.title: 10 Books to Indulge In This Winter
item.dc:creator: Shubaangi Bisht
item.description: 10 Books to Indulge In This Winter Winter holidays are the perfect time to treat yourself with a hoard of books. Some people want imaginative escapes into sun-baked stories, others plenty of snow and roaring fires and some like me who can never get enough of Harry Potter even after all these year. Either way, […]

item.title: What Not to Expect at NSIT
item.dc:creator: Shubaangi Bisht
item.description: What Not to Expect When at NSIT With all the dreams and aspirations that fuchhas have, come a bundle of expectations; in-build notions and trust on their Quora search. Presumptions make you wander in the dreams- I believe I can fly, I believe I can touch the sky” and the pseudo freedom is […]

item.title: Society Experiences – IEEE
item.dc:creator: Navdha
item.description: Name: Krishan Dhingra Society: IEEE Q 1. What is a typical day/meet like in your society? We are not different from other societies when it comes to the plethora of activities which take place during the meet, which includes discussions, planning of future events and of course some fun and frolic. But what sets us […]

item.title: 10 Problems Boys Face In NSIT’s Hostels
item.dc:creator: Navdha
item.description: At some point of time or the other, most of us have to step out of our homes and live in an absolutely new world called hostel. When it comes to NSIT, hostel turns to be a building behind the walls of which most sinistrous events occur, a place where each birthday boy curses his […]

item.title: My Twinged Garden
item.dc:creator: Tarasha Khurana
item.description: The pain of losing someone you care for is inevitable. For no one can fill up the void Caused due to that person’s departure! The pain they leave behind, The memories they leave behind. Those mischievous giggles, Those melancholy lows, All those moments were cherishable, though! Those sharing of liquorice, Those fights over the truffle […]

item.title: Top 10 Night-out spots in Delhi!
item.dc:creator: Deepika Naryani
item.description: College life is perhaps the best part of our life! Friends, hangouts, parties, pranks and not to forget, the extremely awesome NIGHTOUTS! Taking a stroll on those empty roads, bike rides, midnight ice creams, and what not? Now, the biggest question, “Yaar, Kahan jaana hai?” Keeping in mind the ecstatic aura and the mouth relishing […]

item.title: Discord With Reality
item.dc:creator: Tarasha Khurana
item.description: Dusk had begun to set in the air; Phase of transience of the atmosphere. I saw a face looking down at me, Deep solemn eyes took me by surprise. Engrossed in chanting a prayer, Aura of verses resonating everywhere. Transfixed, I struggled to find the constellation Which had set a current of exuberation. Those eyes […]
